snippet.title: Indie Game project - Wings Of Bluestar - Character Selection Demo
snippet.description:
WIP for the character selection screen.
Game is about 50% done.
Indie game in development for Steam. A Ps Vita, PS4 and Xbox One port is a possibility if the game does well on Kickstarted and Steam.
All visuals, coding and sound effects are made by me.
Musics are from the game "Blazing Star" by SNK for testing purposes. 
I'll create my own background music for the game.
